reviewText:
The other rated (Jeffrey) that gave this movie 1 star was absolutely correct. I also saw both DVD's "When Paradise is Lost" and "Skin that Cries" and was very disappointed.

After a Civil War in Japan (the kept mentioning World War II, but in WWII, there were't any helicopters and other sophisticated equipment), a group of soldiers are transporting several young women to a designated Green Zone (Safe Location) by foot. Every time the soldiers take a break, they rape a young woman or two that they are suppose to protect. The women become so demoralized by the rape that sometimes they walk out in the open in which they are shot in the head by a sniper (who is slowly hunting them down). The soldiers themselves get killed one at a time by the sniper by making careless mistakes.

This goes on through out both DVD's . On the final scene, the youngest girl gets raped by a soldier in which the sniper takes him out. The sniper then walks up to the young girl, who is in shock and lying nude on the ground, and points the gun at her head. That's how the movie ends!!!

The sex and rape scenes in this movie are great with a lot of detail; but what pulls this movie down (way down) is that once you get to know a little about each woman, and begin to have feelings and sympathy for them, they get killed by the sniper. What a big let-down! What was the writer of this story thinking???

Don't buy this DVD set if you think this movie is going to end well.

give this hentai 2 stars because there r only two hentai scenes.... and they are not even that good. Really i can download better things 4 free.
Just a waste of money 2 scenes......... 2mins each. My advise... go to some web page and download a 5min clip 4 free will be better than this movie.

This is a review of both Vol I and vol. II, since both were equally bad and were essentially about the same topic with very little variation. And also because I figure anyone looking to buy this movie will probably buy part I first before part II.

Basically this is a war movie, about the end of WWII, although a very fictionalized account, about some stragglers trying to get back to their main line, taking along with them some female civilians they found/always had with them.

The soldiers seem to like seducing/raping these women while trying to get back home, and the scenes aren't too bad, although there have been many others that were done much better in movies I have seen before (see my other hentai reviews).

What really turned me off about this film however, is that after each seduction scene, a sniper takes out the girl with a bullet to the head. I mean, bang! That's it! No more sex scenes with her! Duh! And every time a soldier has his way with one of them, bang! Down goes another one! Not only does this eliminate the ability to continue the fun by perhaps having another scene with her later on, but the shocking end of it all after this viewer's blood heated up watching such a hot scene really froze my blood cold and it took a long while to get it going again. I found no real desire to continue watching this film after the second or third assassination.

Truth be told, if I'd known it was a war movie, I'd never have bought it in the first place as that film genre is not my favorite, and if someone had put a picture of the back of the DVD case up, it would have said just what the film was about, and I'd have known right then to stay away from it.

Also, there is no cage anywhere in either film, so don't let the title mislead you. If you were looking forward to perhaps seeing two girls in a cage, look elsewhere. It is simply an army unit dragging some girls around, using them, and watching helplessly as they get shot in the head after they are used. And again, the anime is not that good!

To give you an idea what I really thought about this film, the day I received it from Amazon, I sold it back to them.
